item.title: Fall Break In Review: Boston and MIT
item.author: Era Dewan
item.description: I wrote some random reflections and some observations of my time at MIT on the plane back from Boston. I was only there for 3 days, so these are first impressions. me and kathy MIT Culture Good things The MIT vocabulary goes strong: psets, hosed, numbers for everything (majors & buildings). You know a culture is strong when conversations are complete gibberish to people outside. Itâ€™s so funny to see the same things at your university but branded slightly different (MIT Police, MIT Hillel, MIT SAAS, etc).
